rooms.description: Central living area with modern finishes and ample natural light. Vastu-compliant placement for social interactions.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living room, ensuring a smooth flow according to Indian residential design norms.
Functional kitchen with open layout, Vastu compliant placement towards the east for positive energy and natural light.
Quiet, designated office space near living area to maintain a clear separation of work from relaxation zones. Windows aligned per Vastu for optimal concentration.
Small utility washroom located conveniently near the kitchen and living room areas; designed to ensure minimal disturbance.
Entrance hall acting as a transitional space from outside to interior spaces. Vastu compliant alignment ensures good energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring smooth transition while maintaining privacy and security.
Large south-facing window to enhance natural lighting while adhering to Vastu guidelines of having windows on the south side for energy balance.
East facing window to bring in positive energy and light as per Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Master bedroom located in the north-west corner for Vastu compliance, ensuring privacy and calm ambiance.
Secondary bedroom placed adjacent to master bedroom with ample light; designed with budget considerations in mind.
Third bedroom or guest room allocated in a less central location, still ensuring privacy and comfort.
Shared bathroom for the bedrooms ensuring practical use; positioned to minimize noise transfer.
Dedicated entertainment area with sound insulation and optimal viewing angles. Placed in a separate section to avoid disturbance of living areas.

openings.description: Compact, well-lit staircase ensuring safe and efficient vertical circulation; placed according to Vastu guidelines.
North facing window in master bedroom for enhanced calmness and positive energy as per Vastu principles.

budget_note: Design optimized to adhere to a tight budget without compromising on essential features. Modern finishes, functional layouts, and efficient use of space ensure affordability.
vastu_compliance: All placements have been considered based on traditional Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow, privacy, and security in the design.
